globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com https://esm.sh; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.openai.azure.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data: https:;
